com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm
Class ZCB<T extends TimePoint>

java.lang.Object
  com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm.ZCB<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
CurveTimeSeriesOperator<T>
public class ZCB<T extends TimePoint>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CurveTimeSeriesOperator<T>

Discount operator. It calculates the price of a Zero Coupon Bond evaluated at time present with maturity at time future, by using the Monte Carlo scenario provided. The pricing implementation discounts along the instantaneous spot interest rates of the given scenario by calculating the weighted average of the spot rate (integration of piecewise constant evolution of the spot rate) and discounting a unit price with the resulting rate.

Author:
Luigi Sgro
